texts.LongWelcomeMessage: This is a capstone project dedicated for Banaybanay, Davao Oriental. This aims to show graphical information for forecasting and heatmap related to tuberculosis cases in Banaybanay
texts.ImportFormatWarningMessage: Please make sure that the columns of your csv or excel file has the following format like the table below:
texts.FormatNote: To avoid exceptions please make sure that every column follows this formats:
texts.DateNote: Date or Date of Registration column should be formatted into Date (format: MM/DD/YY).
texts.GenderNote: Gender column should be formatted into M - Male, and F - Female.
texts.StatusNote: Status column should be 1 - Alive, and 0 - Dead.
texts.CuredNote: Result column should be CURED or NOT CURED.
texts.CaseIdDuplicateTable: This case id already exist in the current table context.
texts.CaseIdDuplicateDatabase: This case id already exist in the database.
texts.ConfirmDeleteCase: Are you sure to delete case id '{0}'?
texts.InvalidDateRange: Invalid: start date should be less than end date.
